com.ge.predix.mobile.serviceFoundation

Interface ServiceRouter


  • public interface ServiceRouter
    PredixMobileJavaSDK Created by Clifton Craig on 8/23/16.

    The Service Router connects the JavaScript code running in the webview to the underlying registered Services. Each service Should be annotated with RequestMapping annotations. These mappings contain URL patterns and HTTP methods that connect URL requests from the web view to the services. You can use the ServiceRouter to register additional custom services, to unregister services, to count the available serviceor query whether or not a service has been registered.

    • Method Detail

      • registerService

        void registerService(java.lang.Class restController)
        Register a class to function as a PM API service. The class should contain RequestMapping
        Parameters:
        restController - Any Java class with RequestMapping annotations which describe the URL methods and patterns the service responds to.

      • unregisterService

        void unregisterService(java.lang.Class restController)
        Unregister the given class from the router. Any subsequent PM API URLRequest will no longer be routed to instances of the class after invoking this method.
        Parameters:
        restController - A Class which has been prior registered.

      • unregisterAllServices

        void unregisterAllServices()
        Unregister all classes from the router. Any subsequent PM API URLRequest will no longer be routed to any class instances after invoking this method.

      • serviceIsRegistered

        boolean serviceIsRegistered(java.lang.Class restController)
        Call this method to determine if a given service has been registered.
        Parameters:
        restController - A Class which may or may not have been registered for a PM API URLRequest.
        Returns:
        true if the given class has been registered, false otherwise.

      • serviceCount

        int serviceCount()
        Queries the total number of classes which are currently registered for a PM API URLRequest.
        Returns:
        the number of currently registered service classes.

      • processRequest

        void processRequest(ServiceSession serviceSession)
        Call this method to process a PM API URLRequest. These requests
        Parameters:
        serviceSession - A ServiceSession containing the URLRequest and PMAPIResponseHandler for the service call.

      • isInSecureMode

        boolean isInSecureMode()

      • addServiceProvider

        void addServiceProvider(ServiceProvider serviceProvider)
        Adds a ServiceProvider which can contain further services to this ServiceRouter instance. The ServiceProvider is a factory which creates instances of registered classes. It is used to decorate or enhance the service classes as they are instantiated.
        Parameters:
        serviceProvider - A ServiceProvider containing further service definitions.

      • setSecureMode

        void setSecureMode(boolean secureMode)
